main event: A military source reported a brief sighting of an unidentified object over New York State in 1955.
interesting points: The sighting involved both ground radar and visual confirmation from the air.
The observation lasted only two seconds, making it a very brief encounter.
The object appeared to have a dark center, adding to its mysterious nature.
The lack of sufficient data made the analysis of this UFOB very difficult.
The military source makes this a credible and official report.
sighted object: unidentified object with a dark center
